    • Constructor Detail

      • SnapshotStore

        public SnapshotStore(java.io.File snapshotDirectory,
                     DocumentSnapshotFactory documentSnapshotFactory)
              throws SnapshotStoreException
        Parameters:
        snapshotDirectory - the directory in which to store the snapshots. Must be non-null. If it does not exist, it will be created.
        documentSnapshotFactory - factory for creating DocumentSnapshots
        Throws:
        SnapshotStoreException - if the snapshot directory does not exist and cannot be created

      • openMostRecentSnapshot

        public SnapshotReader openMostRecentSnapshot()
                                      throws SnapshotStoreException
        Returns:

        SnapshotStoreException
